CALL PURPOSE: Assistance with duplicate records issue in PCR software
Explanation and guidance on utilizing duplicate detection feature

Team member 1.Role: creating a summary of the issue

Current challenges/pain points: Duplicate company records when exporting candidates

Existing service usage: Using PCR for legal database management

resolution_steps_taken: identified potential solution using duplicate detection piece in the import tool
offered to provide additional information to trainers for further assistance
discussed possibility of using middleware or ETL software for data migration
outstanding_action_items: awaiting summary of issue from customer
creating ticket for technical team to investigate
following up with customer to discuss security settings and training
next_steps_required: customer to provide summary of issue
agent to create ticket and add additional information
technical team to investigate and provide solution

agent_performance.technical_knowledge_demonstrated: good understanding of product features and technical capabilities

RELATIONSHIP_HEALTH.Trust_level_signals: High trust, as evidenced by ongoing problem-solving discussions and willingness to pay invoices during calls

CUSTOMER_JOURNEY_STAGE.Onboarding_status: Advanced, discussing adding new users and scaling up
CUSTOMER_JOURNEY_STAGE.Product_adoption_level: High, actively using and integrating the product into daily operations
CUSTOMER_JOURNEY_STAGE.Feature_utilization: Moderate to high, but facing issues with duplicate records which indicates a need for better utilization or understanding of features
CUSTOMER_JOURNEY_STAGE.Expansion_opportunities: High, considering adding new seats and discussing security enhancements

RETENTION_FACTORS.Satisfaction_drivers: Responsive support, flexibility in user management
RETENTION_FACTORS.Risk_indicators: Technical issues with the product creating duplicates, potential billing discrepancies
RETENTION_FACTORS.Loyalty_signals: Customer is paying invoices during calls, indicating strong loyalty
RETENTION_FACTORS.Advocacy_potential: High, if current issues are resolved promptly and satisfactorily

COMMUNICATION_PREFERENCES.Preferred_contact_methods: Email for updates, direct calls for immediate issues
COMMUNICATION_PREFERENCES.Response_time_expectations: Immediate to short-term, as shown by same-day ticket submission and quick follow-ups
COMMUNICATION_PREFERENCES.Information_style_preferences: Direct and detailed, prefers high-level summaries followed by in-depth discussions
COMMUNICATION_PREFERENCES.Decision-making_patterns: Consultative, involves team and vendor in decision-making process
